ISSUE.TITLE: The default icon color on the desktop need to be optimized?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug The icon on windows desktop is not clear ![image](https://github.com/localsend/localsend/assets/6024166/31253040-dc39-4930-aca3-258e727abf48) ### To reproduce by default ### Expected behavior More clear transparent icon ### Screenshots _No response_ ### Desktop (please complete the following information) _No response_ ### Smartphone (please complete the following information) _No response_ ### Additional context _No response_

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Enforce white background for logo - fixes #627 This is to ensure that there is always an appropriate level of contrast.
